about_the_game: The music is created exclusively for warriors that pummel through a myriad of dungeons in Asura's mirage! The original soundtrack of Otherworld Legends is composed by Elecrystal Studio. The album features 28 tracks of in-game background music.
detailed_description: The music is created exclusively for warriors that pummel through a myriad of dungeons in Asura's mirage! The original soundtrack of Otherworld Legends is composed by Elecrystal Studio. The album features 28 tracks of in-game background music.
name: Otherworld Legends Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人, but does not include the base game.
